hardcorerevive.chat.revive: §eYou were revive in a random place. The Ender chest is cleared! Dropped items have been deleted. To return the world spawnpoint, set the bonfire at coordinates 0 0
hardcorerevive.chat.clear.end:
§aClean End! Container cleaned:§e %1$s.
§aRejoin to the world
hardcorerevive.chat.disabled: §cHardcore Disabled: To use container cleaning, rejoin to the world.
hardcorerevive.chat.campfire: §eNew world Spawnpoint set. The bonfire can be broken
hardcorerevive.chat.warning: §cMake a backup of the world before using /clearregion. Then confirm: /clearregion confirm
modmenu.summaryTranslation.hardcorereviv: Revive in hardcore world with a full cleanup of items.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.hardcorer: It allows you to be revive in the hardcore world after death, but you will have to pay a price for it.
hardcorerevive.config.title: HardcoreRevive - Settings
